title: Gem Blast
description:
*Description*

Get ready for the biggest, brain busting game of the year!

The rules are simple, destroy the gems with your handy laser beam, but make sure the gem you are destroying is the same colour as your laser beam otherwise you'll get shocked and unable to shoot for a couple of seconds, destroying gems outside of the playing circle will earn you a speed bonus!

Keep an itchy trigger finger mind you because the longer you play, the faster the gems start appearing. If any gems are outside of the playing circle, you only have a short amount of time before a five second countdown starts and when that happens, it's game over!

Controls are simple, move the mouse and click or hold the left button to fire your laser, Successive hits increase your combo chain, but one mistake will reset it, Don't leave any gems outside the playing circle for too long and enjoy the game!

Produced by ID Productions

Released 23/4/16
 
https://idproductions.itch.io

Also available on Browser and Android

*HOW TO INSTALL*

Unzip file to folder of your choice and double click the .exe file to run!
